properties.template:
Pionersky Radar Station(located at abondoned airbase Dunayevka
The radar was deemed operational in 2014. It covers 6000 km and tracks 500 objects simultaniously.

Hantsavichy Radar Station, Belarus. Designed to identify launches of ballistic missiles from western Europe and to track satellites. The station is a 'Volga' type radar. It has a range 200 kilometers and an azimuth of 120 degrees, with elevation of 4 degree to 70 degree.
